messages.content: Hi, I wanted to report that a little girl just went into the rapids.
Her mom jumped in after her, but they were going down the river pretty fast and everyone's still running after them.
Just at the base of Briddievale Falls. They're flowing down river towards non-parts.
Okay, stay on the line with me, okay?
How old is the little girl?
I have no idea. She fell into the river.
She was drifting down and the mom jumped in about a foot from her, but I don't know if she caught her or not. They both kept on going down the river.
Did they have any flotation devices or anything?
Can anybody see either of them?
No. People are still running after them.
